content: hi everyone, we've got a problem with our corporate zulip instance. it won't show preview images for video and gif links. https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/20746
my colleague told me he experienced this with every zulip instance he's ever used
@Keno Can you confirm that the "Show previews of uploaded and linked images" option is selected in your organization's settings? https://zulip.com/help/allow-image-link-previews
Also, it is expected that videos don't preview, until #20449 is merged.

Alya Abbott said:

Keno Can you confirm that the "Show previews of uploaded and linked images" option is selected in your organization's settings? https://zulip.com/help/allow-image-link-previews

I'd have to ask our sysadmin (I'm not in IT), but linked still images have previews

Alex Vandiver said:

Also, it is expected that videos don't preview, until #20449 is merged.

I see, looking forward to that! :) Do you know if this includes animated GIFs as well?
